title: BRIEF-Iridium Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.10
text: 31 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Iridium Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.10 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Iridium Communications Inc: * IRIDIUM ANNOUNCES FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS; COMPANY ISSUES 2018 OUTLOOK * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.10 * Q4 REVENUE $115.5 MILLION * ‍EXPECTS TOTAL SERVICE REVENUE OF APPROXIMATELY $440 MILLION FOR FULL-YEAR 2019​ * ‍EXPECTS OEBITDA MARGIN OF APPROXIMATELY 60% IN 2019​ * ‍EXPECTS TOTAL SERVICE REVENUE GROWTH BETWEEN 10% AND 12% FOR FULL-YEAR 2018​ * SEES ‍FULL-YEAR 2018 OEBITDA BETWEEN $280 MILLION AND $290 MILLION​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.10, REVENUE VIEW $111.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
